summary: This little mod tweak the requiem destruction damage, load after requiem, and then run reqtificator
descriptionHtml:
[font=Trebuchet MS]I thought I would never make any mod years ago, then here came requiem, I was so pissed of getting one shot every ten mins , so I made several mods to make requiem less unforgiving , this is one of these mods.

What it does?

It changes the multipliers for sophisticated destruction spells (50 ) and above, higher lvl spells should now less powerful, but still lethal at reasonable degree[/font]
author: MC
